subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: To support widened implementation of fiscal reforms as well as to address emerging policy development and other capacity needs , emphasing poverty reduction issues. It focuses on addressing human capacity and institutional needs  at sub-national level, esp. in less-developed regions based on previous program experience in public expenditure management and taxation. It also supports development of pro-poor fiscal policy intiatives.
subproject.title: Support to Fiscal Reform

title: Capacity Building to Support Fiscal Reform in China
